title: I can't leave my games?
body:
This has been happening for a couple weeks now. My game would start, it'd be running fine, and then as soon as the game finishes then there is no VICTORY/DEFEAT screen part, and I can't continue to get out of the match, so i have to force quit and then i cant start league properly for the next couple hours unless i restart my PC.
Any Thoughts?

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds odd, could you try a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if that helps.
